ch.nolix.interfaces.util

Interface ErrorReportable


  • public interface ErrorReportable
    An error reportable object is an object that can report occuring errors.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and SIMPLE_CLASS_NAME Method and Description
      void activateErrorMode()
      Activates the error mode of this error reportable object.
      void inactivateErrorMode()
      Inactives the error mode of this error reportable object.
      boolean isOnErrorMode() 

    • Method Detail

      • activateErrorMode

        void activateErrorMode()
        Activates the error mode of this error reportable object. When an error reportable object is on the error mode, it throws an exceptions when an error occurs on the call of a certain method.

      • isOnErrorMode

        boolean isOnErrorMode()
        Returns:
        true if this reportable object is on error mode

      • inactivateErrorMode

        void inactivateErrorMode()
        Inactives the error mode of this error reportable object.
